verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> taken <S%G2983><s%> from among <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is ordained <S%G2525><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> men <S%G444><s%> in things <S%G3588><s%> pertaining to <S%G4314><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may offer <S%G4374><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> sins: <S%G266><s%>

Who can <S%G1410><s%> have compassion <S%G3356><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> ignorant, <S%G50><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on them that are out of the way; <S%G4105><s%> for that <S%G1893><s%> he <S%G846><s%> himself also <S%G2532><s%> is compassed with <S%G4029><s%> infirmity. <S%G769><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> by reason hereof <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5026><s%> he ought, <S%G3784><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> to offer <S%G4374><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3756><s%> taketh <S%G2983><s%> this honor <S%G5092><s%> unto himself, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he that is called <S%G2564><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> as <S%G2509><s%> was <S%G2532><s%> Aaron. <S%G2><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> to be made <S%G1096><s%> a high priest; <S%G749><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he that said <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> today <S%G4594><s%> have I <S%G1473><s%> begotten <S%G1080><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> place, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art a priest <S%G2409><s%> forever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> when he had offered up <S%G4374><s%> <S%G5037><s%> prayers <S%G1162><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplications <S%G2428><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> strong <S%G2478><s%> crying <S%G2906><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tears <S%G1144><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him that was able <S%G1410><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was heard <S%G1522><s%> in that he feared; <S%G575><s%> <S%G2124><s%>
Though <S%G2539><s%> he were <S%G5607><s%> a Son, <S%G5207><s%> yet learned <S%G3129><s%> he obedience <S%G5218><s%> by <S%G575><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> he suffered; <S%G3958><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> being made perfect, <S%G5048><s%> he became <S%G1096><s%> the author <S%G159><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> unto all <S%G3956><s%> them that obey <S%G5219><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>
Called <S%G4316><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek. <S%G3198><s%>

Of <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2254><s%> have many things to say, <S%G4183><s%> <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hard <S%G1421><s%> to be uttered, <S%G3004><s%> seeing <S%G1893><s%> ye are <S%G1096><s%> dull <S%G3576><s%> of hearing. <S%G189><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> ye ought <S%G3784><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> teachers, <S%G1320><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> that one teach <S%G1321><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> be the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G746><s%> principles <S%G4747><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> oracles <S%G3051><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are become <S%G1096><s%> such as have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of milk, <S%G1051><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of strong meat. <S%G4731><s%> <S%G5160><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that useth <S%G3348><s%> milk <S%G1051><s%> is unskillfull <S%G552><s%> in the word <S%G3056><s%> of righteousness: <S%G1343><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a babe. <S%G3516><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> strong meat <S%G4731><s%> <S%G5160><s%> belongeth <S%G2076><s%> to them that are of full age, <S%G5046><s%> even those who by reason of <S%G1223><s%> use <S%G1838><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> their senses <S%G145><s%> exercised <S%G1128><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> discern <S%G1253><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>
